node.html:
• Write modern, performant, maintainable code for a diverse array of client and internal projects
  • Work with a variety of different languages, frameworks, and content management systems such as JavaScript, TypeScript, React JS, Vue JS and Netlify
  • Communicate with multi-disciplinary teams of engineers, and clients on a daily basis

• Developed and maintained code for in-house websites primarily using JavaScript, HTML, CSS, Sass, jQuery and Require JS
  • Developed and shipped highly interactive web applications for Comico
  • Clients included Korea, Japan, Thailand, Spain, Philippines and more

• Architected and implemented the front-end of in-house websites, which lets users log in, watch full movies, and read the news in the browser
  • Manually tested sites in various browsers and mobile devices to ensure cross-browser compatibility and responsiveness
  • Interfaced with user experience designers and other developers to ensure thoughtful and coherent user experiences
